data.prayer: Father, convict the 25,889 believers in Kândal to be holy and righteous. Inspire them to gather in small groups for accountability and spiritual growth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kândal, Cambodia
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Kândal.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 3 babies will be born in the next hour to families who are far from God in Kândal, Cambodia.
data.prayer: Spirit, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, bless the state of Kândal with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Kândal an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.prayer: Father, 0.6% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Father, it’s possible most of the 1,222,334 lost people in  Kândal, Cambodia have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 25,889 believers living in Kândal, Cambodia.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.section_summary:
the state of Kândal, Cambodia has a population of 1,265,800.

We estimate Kândal has 25,889 people who might know Jesus, 17,577 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,222,334 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 48 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Kândal, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.
